file_content.text: Take a day or two. Remember who you are while there's still a quiet place in the galaxy.
By the time you're recovered and back at headquarters, we'll be ready to march on Coruscant.
This is Keeper to Cipher Nine. Emergency transmission--please respond.
I have reports of a level-five annihilation wave on Quesh, triggered by an Imperial bombing run. An SIS team was the target. Are you alright?
That explosion was something called the "Shadow Arsenal." It was Ardun Kothe's weapon of choice to win the war.
Mission accomplished.
Neither the Shadow Arsenal nor Ardun Kothe is a threat any longer...
Haven't I told you not to worry? I'm alive, and our enemies are finished.
I'm fine, Keeper.
This is Cipher Nine. No permanent damage. I can't say the same for our enemies.
I'm fine, Keeper.
Ardun Kothe and his weapon--the Shadow Arsenal--are no longer a threat...
I was afraid you were dead. What happened to you out there...?
Cipher... what have you been through?
Updating the minister now. Pulling two sections off alert, giving approval to the Moffs to accelerate our timetable.
Tell me the rest later. You changed the war, and everything's going to be different.
The war's only going to get worse. And something odd is going on--there are other forces involved.
We have work to do.
Then we'll figure it out soon enough.
I've been undercover a long time. I want to be Imperial again.
I'm ready to come home.
You were always Imperial. You'll always be one of us.
Last time I was at headquarters, you said you'd think about us. How different will it be when I'm back?
I'm coming home to you.
I wasn't made for that sort of analysis. It hurts my mind.
I nearly died--not because of the Republic, but because of Imperial incompetence and Imperial treachery.
This was a disaster.
Ardun Kothe and his weapon have been neutralized. That's the only thing that went right with your assignment.
You've raised your voice, and your pulse rate has increased. You're clearly upset.
But you're describing a victory for the Empire. You saved countless lives, accelerated our timetable for conquest.
Take pride in that. The rest we can resolve later.
I appreciate the situation. But if we're going to work together, there are things I need to know.
You owe me some answers.
Of course. As Lord Jadus's Hand, you're entitled to whatever I can provide.
Then we should talk.
You're right, of course. A victory is a victory.
I apologize.
I'm losing patience with you and your leadership, "Keeper."
Don't patronize me.
You've made yourself clear.
Begin encrypted message. This is Keeper to Cipher Nine.
We don't have long before Republic intercept, but I wanted to hear from you. Status report, please.
I'm still inside the SIS. I'm making progress, but I can't give details.
The mission is going well.
You don't know how much I've missed hearing that voice. Things aren't easy, but I'm still with the SIS.
It's really good to see you...
Remember the days when terrorism kept us close? But... that's not why I'm calling.
It's been much too long, Keeper. Things aren't easy, but I'm still with the SIS.
It's good to see you.
I wouldn't expect any less. But that wasn't my concern.
Everything's fine, Keeper. Situation normal.
Intelligence brainwashed me!
Is that right?
I'm getting disturbing reports about your activities. Loss of Imperial life on Hoth, an incident at headquarters... you threatened Watcher Three.
I'm getting disturbing reports about your activities. Loss of Imperial life on Hoth, and some sort of incident at headquarters.
Cipher, I need to know if the stress is getting to you.
It won't be much longer. I promise.
I can see this through.
What does my state of mind matter? I can't pull out now, can I?
Suppose I wanted to abort...
No. But I need to understand, all the same.
You wanted someone inside the SIS. What I did, I did to earn their trust.
I had to maintain my cover.
Your job is to learn what the SIS is after. Then, and only then, you must kill Ardun Kothe.
It's the only way you're coming home to us. Keeper out.
Don't lose sight of those goals. Keeper out.
Patience. The serum is working. Play the game until you're free.
